price: او بې شکه په اسمان كې موږ ډير پاخه برجونه جوړ كړي او هغه مو د نندارچيانو لپاره ښايسته كړيدي.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ جَعَلۡنَا فِي ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجٗا وَزَيَّنَّٰهَا لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: walaqad jaʿalnā fī al-samāi burūjan wazayyannāhā lilnnāẓirīna
